test.name: Cenário: Adicionar review em um produto aleatório da moda masculina

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
